title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
description: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the newly set aliases.
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the newly set column aliases should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as "column1".
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
